article_title: Why Bernie Sanders Just Doesn't Get It

article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman

og.description: Vermont Democratic Sen. Bernie Sanders appeared on Fox News yesterday and Chris Wallace asked him why his own state had abandoned all plans to implement single payer health insurance – something that is apparently allowed under Obamacare. Since Sanders is a self-described “socialist,” you would expect him to be up to [...]
